subject: p18906643
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no change in position of the monitoring and support devices. The tip of the endotracheal tube is quite high and would benefit from advancement by 1 to 2 cm. Moderate cardiomegaly persists. There is unchanged evidence of mild pulmonary edema. There also is retrocardiac atelectasis and the presence of a small right pleural effusion cannot be excluded. No new parenchymal opacities. No pneumothorax. Unchanged normal alignment of the sternal wires.
